About

Hall Web & Design Co.

Hall Web & Design Co. is a web design & SEO company in South Carolina that helps churches and small businesses reach others with good. Whether you are a pastor looking to spread Christ and help people find your church, or a hot dog vendor who seeks to make the world better one hot dog at a time, we can help you in your mission.

Ethan Hall has been working with technology for for over a decade and seeks to bring excellence to each client he takes on, knowing that his success depends on yours. Ultimately, he seeks to glorify God in his hard work.

Take a look at our client portfolio to get a sample of the kind of work we do. When you're ready, reach out to Ethan to see how Ethan Hall Design can be of service to you in your mission.
